bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jun lie 皸裂 . Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry tie ruo 鐵爇：金瘡，毒物傷皮 肉，止風水不入，入水不爛，手足皸坼 , “In the case of wounds inflicted by metal objects, and poisonous matter harming the skin, it prevents wind and water from entering. Also, [when the wound is] put into water it will not rot. [It furthermore cures] chapped skin cracks on the hands and feet”.
